tool.name: Create tiled QC images
tool.description: Generates channel pannels to QC data.

param.name: input_path
param.label: Enter path to images for qc.

param.name: user_wells
param.label: Enter wells you would like QC'd, separated by commas. Duplicates will be removed.

param.name: user_times
param.label: Enter timepoints you would like QC'd, separated by commas. Duplicates will be removed.

tool.help: Creates QC images of all channels per timepoint and well combination.
